entry.title: RAP Behaviour Implementation get_*_features/get_*_authorization : Should reported really get filled?
entry.content:
Hi RAP'lers,

the RAP Behaviour Implementation methods get_global_features, get_global_authorizations, get_instance_features, get_instance_authorizations have a changing parameter reported.

Is it really needed to fill this parameter? What is expected in this parameters? Where/when are they shown to the user in a Fiori Elements App?

If they should get filled, what would be the best approach?

The implementation eg in bp_demo_unmanaged_root_draft does not seem to be a sensible approach to me.

Thanks for some hints here,

  Wolfgang

entry.title: How can I call a cds odata from ABAP so that it will use the definitions in the behavior class
entry.content:

The service works perfectly.

But what if I would like to update this ztable inside the same SAP system - I would prefer to use the service & behavior so that everything is stable - is it easy to call this service from normal ABAP ?

Is this possible ?

thanks

Lars

entry.title: Top 25 SAP S/4HANA & ABAP Interview Questions and Answers (2025)
entry.content:
Preparing for a SAP ABAP or S/4HANA interview can feel overwhelming. You spend hours revising concepts, yet when the interview starts, the real challenge is remembering which questions are most commonly asked and how to answer them with clarity.

To help you overcome this, I‚Äôve compiled the Top 25 SAP ABAP and S/4HANA Interview Questions for 2025‚Äîbased on real-world interview experiences and what hiring managers actually look for.

This post curates the most common SAP ABAP & S/4HANA interview questions for 2025‚Äîspanning DDIC, ALV, BDC, CDS, AMDP, Open vs Native SQL, ABAP on HANA, Web Dynpro and more. For clear, step-by-step answers, watch the full breakdown here:
üëâ Video: Top 25 SAP S/4HANA & ABAP Interview Questions and Answers (2025)

üìå Top 25 SAP ABAP & S/4HANA Interview Questions (2025)

  1. What is SAP ABAP?
  2. What is the ABAP Data Dictionary (DDIC)?
  3. Difference between transparent tables and pooled/cluster tables
  4. What are SmartForms and their benefits over SAP Scripts?
  5. Difference between function modules and BAPIs
  6. What is BDC (Batch Data Communication)? Methods: recording, session, call transaction
  7. What are modularization techniques in ABAP?
  8. Difference between Classical Reports, Interactive Reports, and ALV Reports
  9. What are field symbols and how are they used?
  10. How do you define and use internal tables?
  11. What are the basic data types in ABAP?
  12. What is ABAP Objects (OOP in ABAP)?
  13. Explain inheritance and polymorphism in ABAP Objects
  14. What is a Lock Object? How is locking handled in ABAP?
  15. Open SQL vs Native SQL ‚Äì differences and use cases
  16. What are RICEFW objects in SAP projects?
  17. Explain CALL TRANSACTION and its use cases
  18. What are CDS Views and their significance in S/4HANA?
  19. What is AMDP (ABAP Managed Database Procedure) and why is it used?
  20. Debugging in ABAP ‚Äì breakpoints, watchpoints, ST22 dumps
  21. What is Web Dynpro for ABAP?
  22. CDS vs AMDP vs Traditional Reports ‚Äì when to use which?
  23. What are the key features of ABAP on HANA?
  24. What tools and T-codes are essential for ABAP development?
  25. What are type groups and their purpose in ABAP?

Why this matters in 2025 (How to Crack SAP ABAP Interview)

SAP technology continues to evolve, especially with ABAP on HANA and S/4HANA migrations. Interviewers are no longer just testing textbook knowledge‚Äîthey want to see if you can connect concepts to real project scenarios. These 25 questions cover exactly that mix of fundamentals + modern ABAP practices.

üìΩÔ∏è For in-depth answers, examples, and explanations, check out the full video:
üëâ Top 25 SAP ABAP & S/4HANA Interview Questions and Answers (2025)

üí° Tip: Don‚Äôt just memorize these questions‚Äîtry to explain them in your own words, link them to project experience, and always be ready with a short example. That‚Äôs what makes you stand out in interviews.

entry.title: RAP: Change key in Entity
entry.content:
Hello,

In a list report I built a custom object page.

The details entities are a join (left outer join because the zeta table is empty at the beginning) between I_PROJECTMILESTONEDATA and a zeta table. The two are linked on the milestone field.

At the press of the save button, the save_modified method is called, the Zeta table is updated with the fields inserted by the user.

On press of the button "Duplicate row", the user can copy a selected row, fill the data and save.

The problem is that the Odata v4 method rise and error because the new row has the same index (milestone) of the copied one.

I think the problem could be resolved  implementing late numbering but I cannot make it work.

Any help is appreciated.

Regards

Filippo

entry.title: RAP Error: Mapping Declared but Table Not Recognized, Plus Warning Messages
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I‚Äôm working on a RAP (ABAP RESTful Application Programming) scenario and encountering the following issues:

1. Error in Action: Even though I‚Äôve added the proper mapping and declared the same table in my behavior definition, I still get an error on the action.

Could anyone suggest what else I should verify to resolve this issue?

2. Warnings: Alongside the above error, I‚Äôm seeing two warning messages that I don‚Äôt understand how to address. What are the common causes of such warnings, and how should they typically be resolved in RAP scenarios?

a. "A mapping for type "table" cannot be introduced in "entities."

b. "Association "_CONTRACTHDR" requires an alias. Since none was specified, "CONTRACTHDR" has been derived from the association name." (This comes on nested composition).

entry.title: Calling bound RAP action from CAP / Node.js backend with OData V4
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I am trying to call a bound RAP Action from a CAP backend and am running into some issues with the namespace that comes with the service beeing OData V4. 

As described in the CAP documentation I tried the following syntax:

let response = await external_service.send({
   event: 'final_approval',
   entity: '<MyEntity>',
   data: { 
      username: req.user.id.toLowerCase(), 
      reason: '' },
   params: [{
      ID: id
   }]
})

 This returns an error because the ressource can't be found. As to be expected, because OData V4 action calls need the namespace added as a prefix. The rest of the call looks totally fine.

If I adapt the code to include the namespace, it looks like this:

let response = await external_service.send({
   event: '<MyNamespace>.final_approval',
   entity: '<MyEntity>',
   data: { 
      username: req.user.id.toLowerCase(), 
      reason: '' },
   params: [{
      ID: id
   }]
})

The request fails again - with error:  URI has a slash as last character
This is the result from the the call URI not beeing build correctly. It looks something like this:

/sap/opu/odata4/.../<MyEntity/

The ID is not passed to the URI anymore, so the intance is not called, as well as the actual action call that is missing completely.

Did anyone experience the same behavior?

Note: I got it to work by building the request myself:

let response = await external_service.send({
   method: 'POST',
   headers: {
      "If-Match": '*'
   },
   path: `/<MyEntity>(${id})/<MyNamespace>.final_approval`,
   data: { 
       username: req.user.id.toLowerCase(), 
       reason: ''
   },
})

Thanks in advance!
Best regards,
Lukas

entry.title: How to create a salesorder with i_salesordertp referring to a quotation?
entry.content:
Hi all,

I'm creating a salesorder with EML using i_salesordertp. But it seems I can't refer to a quotation in order to fill the documentflow for the sales order.

Filling the field ReferenceSDDocument itself gives the error "The field "REFERENCESDDOCUMENT" of entity "I_SALESORDERTP" cannot be modified"

And the following example code:

    MODIFY ENTITIES OF i_salesordertp
     ENTITY salesorder
     EXECUTE createwithreference
     FIELDS ( salesdocumenttype
     referencesddocument )

     WITH VALUE #( ( %cid = 'H001'
     %param = VALUE #( salesdocumenttype = 'TA'
     referencesddocument = '0020000011' ) ) )
     MAPPED DATA(ls_mapped)
     FAILED DATA(ls_failed)
     REPORTED DATA(ls_reported).

gives the error "The entity "I_SALESORDERTP" does not have an action "CREATEWITHREFERENCE"".

Can anyone give me a hint on how to use a quotation as reference in i_salesordertp?

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: Not able to update Issuing Storage Location - RESLO - field during PR Creation using BO interface
entry.content:

The app enables the creation of stock transfer purchase requisitions between logical storage locations within the same plant, using item category "U".

However, we need to populate the field "Issuing Storage Location ‚Äì RESLO", which currently does not appear to be available in the Business Object interface, nor accessible via any custom logic options we‚Äôve explored.

Does anyone have experience or suggestions to help us manage this situation?

Thanks

Caterina

entry.title: Draft Enabled RAP Object with association [0..*]
entry.content:
Hi,

we are seeing this strange behavior that seems to be a bug. We have developed a draft enabled managed BO.  This object has the following associations. Both of these associations are not part of object hierarchy.

association [0..1] to I_OfferType_VH as _Type on $projection.OfferType = _Type.OfferType
association [0..*] to C_OfferBUList as _BUList on $projection.OfferUUID = _BUList.OfferUUID

The first association is a simple case of type for a document. So when we modify the draft value, the association uses this draft value to determine new value of _Type. This works as expected. User changes the object property and the new values are immediately shown to the user. 

The problem is with the second association. Here we have an association to many ([0..*]). Based on the value of the root entity property, we determine a list of subsequent objects. The current value of draft is being ignored and the logic to resolve data of association is still using the value from the original object. Once the draft gets saved, it starts fetching the correct values. This is too late for us. In other words, the property value gets changed on draft but the corresponding association is still showing relevant entities resolved with the original value. 

Why does draft enablement work fine for association with [0..1] but does not work properly with [0..*]? Is this a limitation of Draft implementation or a bug? It seems like a bug to me.

The stack is ABAP Platform 2023.

entry.title: Yet another "Unspecified provider error occurred. See Error Context and Call Stack."
entry.content:
Hello experts.

I try to learn abap rap. To have something to play I created simple managed service listing persons detail (name, phone, gender etc.). I created action decreaseBirthdate which decrease birth date of selected person by 1 year (for whatever reason you can imagine). When I run the action on multiple persons (OData V4), it works as expected. When I select only one person (OData V2/V4), the change is saved in db but frontend shows message "Unspecified provider error occurred. See Error Context and Call Stack.".

 

So far I figured out that: 

  • for multiple selections the back-end runs 3 times method  /iwbep/if_v4_dp_advanced~read_entity_list( ) and then returns to front-end which is OK
  • for a single selection the back-end does same things as mentioned above but after that for some reason it calls /iwbep/if_v4_dp_advanced~read_entity( ) which leads to mentioned error.

Any idea how to overcome the issue? 

The code can be inspected on TRL/100 under zrapstudy package.

Thank you in advance.

entry.title: Need help in implementing "Multiple value selection" into "Value Help CDS view"
entry.content:
Hello Team,

I have requirement in SAP Public Cloud as follows ‚Äì

I have implemented one CDS view Z_I_MATDOC_VH for value help for the standard field in which I‚Äôm fetching data from standard CDS view I_MaterialDocumentHeader_2. I have implemented necessary annotations in this custom CDS view.

There is another CDS  view Z_I_SELCTION for input selection. It has got 3 fields as follows ‚Äì

-CompanyCode

-MaterialDocument

-MaterialDocumentYear

I‚Äôm using CDS view Z_I_MATDOC_VH into annotation -@Consumption.valueHelpDefinition : [{ entity: { name: ‚ÄòZ_I_MATDOC_VH‚Äô,

Element: ‚ÄòMaterialDocument‚Äô}}]

I‚Äôm also using annotation - @Consumption.filter.multipleSelection: true

The system is giving proper value help for field ‚ÄòMaterialDocument‚Äô.

But I‚Äôm able to select only one value from it.

My requirement is to select Multiple Values from the entries of Value Help.
Please help me with your suggestions and code snippets.

entry.title: RAP error after refresh custom object page with multi input component inside a table
entry.content:
Hello everyone,
the fiori App I'm working on, serve as a replacement of transaction VK11/VK12.
In the following example, we created 3 conditions record, two with only project milestone as condition key and the other with milestone and materials as key:
 

 

 
The field materials is a multi input component:
 

 

 
items table(milestones) and materials are two RAP entities with the following association:
 

 

Basically the two entities are zeta table:

 

 

the table field after the wbs element (ParentConditionRecord) is the link to the milestones table/entity together with the milestone number:

 

Keys for Material entity:

 

Keys for Milestone entity:

The problem arise when I try to add another condition for a different material through the button duplicate row:

 

In my custom controller we have:

 

‚Äãafter pressing the save button, we have the following:

 

 

 

 


 

The error happens when I call the action to refresh the UI:

(the action has side effects so it cannot be static, that means we need a context to invoke the action on).

the action response is correct:

 {"@odata.etag":"W/\"SADL-000000000000000000000C~0.0000000\"","ProjectMilestone":"4938","ConditionRecord":"0000344090","WbsI":"6302","Wbs":"HQ01C3C911","UsageCode":"ZIPA","UsageCodeName":"PROVISIONAL ACCEPTANCE CERTIFICATE","Mapping":"ZIPA","ConditionTypeName":"PAC","ConditionType":"ZIPA","BasicFixDate":null,"PaymentTerm":"0001","MatGrp2":"","Percentage":"2.00","ConditionText":"","Amount":"0.00","RecordCreationDate":"2025-09-26T09:32:37.612937Z","_Materials":[{"projectmilestone":"4938","material":"HQ01C3C903004850","ConditionRecord":"0000344090"}]}

 

If I force a browser refresh, everything works correctly:

the response is the same as the action's one:

{"@odata.etag":"W/\"SADL-000000000000000000000C~0.0000000\"","ProjectMilestone":"4938","ConditionRecord":"0000344090","WbsI":"6302","Wbs":"HQ01C3C911","UsageCode":"ZIPA","UsageCodeName":"PROVISIONAL ACCEPTANCE CERTIFICATE","Mapping":"ZIPA","ConditionTypeName":"PAC","ConditionType":"ZIPA","BasicFixDate":null,"PaymentTerm":"0001","MatGrp2":"","Percentage":"2.00","ConditionText":"","Amount":"0.00","RecordCreationDate":"2025-09-26T09:32:37.612937Z","_Materials":[{"projectmilestone":"4938","material":"HQ01C3C903004850","ConditionRecord":"0000344090"}]}

 

Any help is greatly appreciated,

regards

Filippo.

entry.title: Disable the multi line edit in SAP RAP application in Edit Mode
entry.content:
Hi Folks,

Working with S/4 HANA 2023 FPS03 version.

In an SAP RAP-based Fiori Elements LROP application with oData V4 version, there are two Object Pages involved.

List Report - Displays a list of Objects,  First Object Page - Upon selecting an object from the list, this page a table with line items related to child entities, based on the keys from the parent CDS view.

In the table toolbar on the First Object Page, there will be a Create button (enabled via an association with Create from Parent in the Behavior Definition). Clicking this button navigates to the Second Object Page for creation or update of the line items.

When users click Edit on the First Object Page, all the line items in the table become editable via multi-line edit. However, the requirement is to disable this multi-line edit functionality in the table on the First Object Page. Instead, users should:

Use the Create button to navigate to the Second Object Page to add new line items.

Click on individual rows in the table to navigate to the Second Object Page for updating existing items.

Kindly suggest, how to disable the multi line edit in Edit Mode. Any suggestions, really appreciate it.

Regards,
Venkatesh K

Hint: ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model SAP Fiori for SAP S/4HANA #Core Data Services (CDS)
